title: #180 - Big Ed Puts Mayo In Zach's Hair
description: On this episode of the H3 Podcast we are joined by BIG ED THA GOAT- living legend and hair-care extraordinaire! Beside giving Zach a hands on lesson in mayo application we also talk literal gaffe's from some of our favorite politicans and Dan sends news!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
